imdb.title: Nurarihyon no mago
imdb.plot: Rikuo Nura appears to be an average middle school student. No one knows that he comes home every day to a house full of youkai, nor that he transforms into the all-powerful leader of these spirits at night. However, much to the di...

episodes.title: The Nura Clan's Third Awakens
episodes.plot: Having lost his father at an early age, young Rikuo Nura aspires to become the Supreme Commander of yokai just like his grandfather and late father did.

episodes.title: Two Justices
episodes.plot: Ryuji Keikain and Mamiru Keikain, two onmyoji who are powerful enough to take down even Aotabo, have arrived in Ukiyoe Town.

episodes.title: Yura's Realization
episodes.plot: Ryuji Keikain uses his Shikigami "Gyogen" to attack Rikuo, who defends himself with his blade. Ryuji halts his attack when he recognizes the blade as "Nenekirimaru," a Spirit Blade that can only cut down yokai.

episodes.title: Nurarihyon and Princess Yo
episodes.plot: During the era when the Toyotomi Clan ruled Japan, there lived a young woman known as Princess Yo, who could heal any wound or disease with her magical powers.

episodes.title: Towards Today
episodes.plot: Nurarihyon enters Osaka Castle to rescue Princess Yo from Hagoromo-Gitsune.

episodes.title: The Legends of Tono
episodes.plot: Kiyotsugu proposes that the Kiyojuji Paranormal Patrol members visit Yura's home in Kyoto as part of a summer yokai research project.

episodes.title: Kyokasuigetsu
episodes.plot: At Oshu-Tono's Hidden Village, Rikuo spends his days in intense training.

episodes.title: Hagoromo-Gitsune Kyoto Invasion
episodes.plot: In Kyoto, the Keikain seals are broken one after another by Hagoromo-Gitsune.

episodes.title: The Grey Onmyoji
episodes.plot: Rikuo completes his training and returns to Ukiyoe Town with the Tono yokai. Seeing the progress his grandson has made, Nurarihyon allows Rikuo to go to Kyoto.

episodes.title: Hagun
episodes.plot: Yura and Ryuji are forced to fight Akifusa.

episodes.title: Battle Above Kyoto
episodes.plot: The Kyoto yokai are moments away from fulfilling their long-standing wish with only one seal remaining to break. Meanwhile, Rikuo and his clan members on board the Treasure Ship are about to enter Kyoto

episodes.title: Long Standing Wish
episodes.plot: The Nura Clan's Treasure Ship sustains heavy damage by the Kyoto yokai and begins to lose altitude.

episodes.title: The Destiny of the Demon Capital
episodes.plot: A look back on past events as the Nura Clan, Tono yokai, and Keikain onmyoji get ready for their upcoming showdown.

episodes.title: Becoming the Lord of Pandemonium
episodes.plot: Rikuo is in line to be the Third Heir of the Nura Clan, but has yet to assume the role. Everyone around him wants him to be the Third Heir, but Rikuo just wants to live a normal life as a human.

episodes.title: Poison Wings Flutter in the Bamboo Thicket
episodes.plot: Zen, the master of potions who has always been like a brother to Rikuo, pays a visit to the Nura Clan, accompanied by his servant Hebidayu. Nurarihyon had invited Zen, seeking his help to convince Rikuo to become the Third Heir.

episodes.title: Yura Keikain and the Kiyojuji Paranormal Patrol
episodes.plot: Yura Keikain, a new student in Rikuo's class, seems to hit it off with Kiyotsugu when they start talking about yokai. Kiyotsugu gets a little carried away and decides to start the Kiyojuji Paranormal Patrol to search for yokai.

episodes.title: The Rat of Darkness Devours the Cat
episodes.plot: It's been some time since Nurarihyon excommunicated the Kyuso Clan. Kyuso, the head of the clan,kidnaps Rikuo's classmates Kana and Yura and demands that Rikuo abdicate his succession to the Third Heir...

episodes.title: Red Plum Blossoms on the Demons' Mountain
episodes.plot: Rikuo develops a fever, and his classmates Kiyotsugu, Kana, and Yura pay him a surprise visit. Tsurara, who was taking care of Rikuo, panics when she sees Kana. But then, Kiyotsugu interrupts with an announcement regarding the Kiyojuji Paranormal Patrol...

episodes.title: A Trap Is Set on the Evil Mountain
episodes.plot: Rikuo and his friends arrive at Mt. Nejireme, which happens to be the domain of a Nura Clan affiliate, the Gyuki Clan. The mountain is oozing with yokai energy, and Yura the onmyoji is not the only one who perceives the eeriness lingering in the air.

episodes.title: Darkness Moves on the Night of the New Moon
episodes.plot: The Gyuki Clan attacks Rikuo and his friends on Mt. Nejireme. Gozumaru goes after Tsurara, while Mezumaru pursues Yura.

episodes.title: Cold-Blooded Umewakamaru
episodes.plot: In the Heian period, Umewakamaru was born into a noble family. He was gifted young man exceling in fencing and academics. However, one day, he is informed that his mother is seriously ill.

episodes.title: Gyuki's Beloved Nura Clan
episodes.plot: When Gyuki crosses swords with Rikuo, he sees for himself the young Master's true power. Gyuki explains his decision to rebel and insists that he will no longer turn against the clan.

episodes.title: Eating the Fruit from Beyond the Evil Mirror
episodes.plot: The Purple Mirror, also known as Ungaikyo has been said to show evil. This mirror slowly turned into a yokai after displaying so much evil on itself.

episodes.title: The Vanguard Wind Blows from the West
episodes.plot: The Nura Clan enjoys a moment of peace before it encounters another threat. The new enemy is the mysterious yokai, Muchi, who wields a poisonous wind like a whip.

episodes.title: Tamazuki and the Seven Shadows
episodes.plot: Nurarihyon is suddenly attacked by Muchi, but unfortunately, that is not the extent of the Nura Clan's problems. A young man by the name of Inugamigyobu-Tanuki Tamazuki reveals himself to Rikuo.

episodes.title: Lord Gyuki's Rebellion: The Whole Story
episodes.plot: Gyuki's rebellion against the Nura Clan shook the foundations of the clan. But ironically, Gyuki's whole story is not one of betrayal, but of pain and loyalty.

episodes.title: The Inugamigyobu-Tanuki Tamazuki's Beckoning
episodes.plot: After his fight against Muchi, Nurarihyon disappears. And Rikuo is left in charge of the Nura Clan, which is being terrorized by Tamazuki's men.

episodes.title: Fierce Fire and Sudden Rain
episodes.plot: Inugamigyobu-Tanuki Tamazuki and his 88 Demons of Shikoku appear before Rikuo again. Tamazuki loudly declares that they will take over the Nura Clan.

episodes.title: The Fighting Girls
episodes.plot: Kagibari-Onna, one of the Seven Phantom Travelers, has infiltrated the Nura Clan by working as a waitress at Bakenekoya. But Yura isn't fooled by her disguise and informs Rikuo.

episodes.title: The Sublime Spirit Burns Crimson
episodes.plot: While Tamazuki prepares to attack, Kiyotsugu tells the Kiyojuji Paranormal Patrol that he has made a discovery from his yokai investigation. Someone has been destroying shrines all over Ukiyoe Town.

episodes.title: Natsumi and Lord Senba
episodes.plot: Natsumi Torii is the only person who continues to pay her respects to the local deity, Lord Senba. Natsumi decides to pay a visit to Lord Senba's shrine, but Lord Sodemogi is headed to the same place to continue his killing spree of local deities.

episodes.title: The Evil Dog Howls at the Ruins
episodes.plot: After Lord Sodemogi's demise, the Shikoku yokai plan to kill Rikuo. But the bloodthirsty Inugami gets impatient and goes after Rikuo on his own.

episodes.title: The Curtain Falls in the Darkness
episodes.plot: Inugami finally shows himself. His head tears off his body and grows longer and longer.

episodes.title: The 7:3 Pledge of Loyalty
episodes.plot: Upon destroying most of Ukiyoe Town's local deities and confirming the strength of the Nura Clan with Inugami's attack, Tamazuki decides to finally bring on the main assault on Rikuo's clan.

episodes.title: Towards the Sunrise
episodes.plot: When the Nura Clan hears about the Shikoku yokai's attack on the Chichibo fortress, its members busily prepare to mobilize their small number of troops.

episodes.title: Darkness and Ice
episodes.plot: The great battle involving the Night Parade of a Hundred Demons has finally begun. Gozumaru and Mezumaru disguise themselves to try to get information about the enemy position.

episodes.title: The Devil's Hammer
episodes.plot: The battle between the Nura Clan and the Shikoku yokai is slowly going in favor of Rikuo and his friends. But strangely enough, Tamazuki is still beaming with confidence.

episodes.title: The Afterglow of Youth
episodes.plot: Tamazuki comes into Nura Clan territory to threaten Rikuo with the sword that once devastated his own father's army of yokai.
